channel.title: Family Medicine Notes
channel.description: Docnotes - Occasional Notes from a family physician - since 1999

item.title: Medical Education Resources
item.description: It has been a long week.  I was at the STFM meeting in San Francisco.  Over 1000 family physicians were there.  This was the one-year anniversary of the release of the Family Medicine Digital Resources Library (FMDRL).   It's been a...

item.description: Ok folks .. time to chime on on a little EMR survey for me.  Entirely optional, of course, but your insight would be helpful. and it will only take about 90 seconds of your time. Thanks! ...

item.title: The Ethics of Humor?
